name: userID
description:
** Warning: Flashing and strobing images, mild body horror **

-

Task: Log into the console and locate "userID."

-

As an extension of my previous project "Portrait Against Perception", I created a mini puzzle game "userID" to explore the futility of getting to know someone's "true" selves due to the constant flux of one's identity. This piece is also my critique against the Internet's normalisation of privacy invasions.

-

Selected for the UCLA Design Media Arts Undergraduate Show 2021.

-

Game by Hua Chai ( @huazzers on itch.io | Twitter | Vimeo )

Fonts by Aaron D. Chand and Style-7.

Programmed in Processing 3.5.4.

Thank you to Beix and Cheng Shon for testing the game!
